mapper.select: SELECT contact.contact_id AS user_id, last_message.content AS content, last_message.created_time AS created_time, last_message.is_read AS is_read FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN ul.sender_id = #{userId} THEN ul.user_id ELSE ul.sender_id END AS contact_id, MAX(ul.created_time) AS last_time FROM ap_user_letter ul WHERE (ul.user_id = #{userId} OR ul.sender_id = #{userId}) AND ul.status = 0 -- 过滤已删除的消息 AND (ul.status_pointing IS NULL OR ul.status_pointing != 110 and status_pointing!=#{userId}) -- 过滤双方删除 GROUP BY contact_id) AS contact JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN ul.sender_id = #{userId} THEN ul.user_id ELSE ul.sender_id END AS contact_id, ul.content, ul.created_time, CASE WHEN ul.user_id = #{userId} THEN 1 ELSE ul.is_read END AS is_read FROM ap_user_letter ul WHERE ul.status = 0 and (ul.user_id = #{userId} OR ul.sender_id = #{userId}) AND (ul.status_pointing IS NULL OR ul.status_pointing != 110 and status_pointing!=#{userId})) AS last_message ON contact.contact_id = last_message.contact_id AND last_message.created_time = contact.last_time ORDER BY last_message.is_read ASC, last_message.created_time DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{size};

SELECT contact.contact_id AS user_id, last_message.content AS content, last_message.created_time AS created_time, last_message.is_read AS is_read FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN ul.sender_id = #{userId} THEN ul.user_id ELSE ul.sender_id END AS contact_id, MAX(ul.created_time) AS last_time FROM ap_user_letter ul WHERE (ul.user_id = #{userId} OR ul.sender_id = #{userId}) AND ul.status = 0 -- 过滤已删除的消息 AND (ul.status_pointing IS NULL OR ul.status_pointing != 110 and status_pointing!=#{userId}) -- 过滤双方删除 GROUP BY contact_id HAVING COUNT(*) = 1 ) AS contact JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN ul.sender_id = #{userId} THEN ul.user_id ELSE ul.sender_id END AS contact_id, ul.content, ul.created_time, CASE WHEN ul.user_id = #{userId} THEN 1 ELSE ul.is_read END AS is_read FROM ap_user_letter ul WHERE ul.status = 0 and (ul.user_id = #{userId} OR ul.sender_id = #{userId}) AND (ul.status_pointing IS NULL OR ul.status_pointing != 110 and status_pointing!=#{userId})) AS last_message ON contact.contact_id = last_message.contact_id AND last_message.created_time = contact.last_time ORDER BY last_message.is_read ASC, last_message.created_time DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{size};

SELECT contact.contact_id AS user_id, last_message.content AS content, last_message.created_time AS created_time, last_message.is_read AS is_read FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN ul.sender_id = #{userId} THEN ul.user_id ELSE ul.sender_id END AS contact_id, MAX(ul.created_time) AS last_time FROM ap_user_letter ul WHERE (ul.user_id = #{userId} OR ul.sender_id = #{userId}) AND ul.status = 0 AND (ul.status_pointing IS NULL OR ul.status_pointing != 110 and status_pointing!=#{userId}) GROUP BY contact_id) AS contact JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN ul.sender_id = #{userId} THEN ul.user_id ELSE ul.sender_id END AS contact_id, ul.content, ul.created_time, CASE WHEN ul.user_id = #{userId} THEN 1 ELSE ul.is_read END AS is_read FROM ap_user_letter ul WHERE ul.status = 0 and (ul.user_id = #{userId} OR ul.sender_id = #{userId}) AND (ul.status_pointing IS NULL OR ul.status_pointing != 110 and status_pointing!=#{userId})) AS last_message ON contact.contact_id = last_message.contact_id AND last_message.created_time = contact.last_time JOIN(SELECT f1.follow_id AS id FROM ap_user_follow f1 JOIN ap_user_follow f2 ON f1.user_id = f2.follow_id AND f1.follow_id = f2.user_id WHERE f1.user_id = #{userId}) l ON contact.contact_id = l.id ORDER BY last_message.is_read ASC, last_message.created_time DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{size};
